text: 2003–04 Polish Volleyball League was the 68th season of Polish Championship (4th season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). AZS Politechnika Warszawska and BBTS Bielsko-Biała were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2003/2004 Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle and Pamapol AZS Częstochowa played in CEV Champions League, Skra Bełchatów and Jastrzębie Borynia played in CEV Challenge Cup. Ivett Jastrzębie Borynia achieved 1st title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2004–05 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2004–05 CEV Top Teams Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2004–05 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Ivett Jastrzębie Borynia |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|PZU AZS Olsztyn |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|Pamapol AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |4 |align=left|Skra Bełchatów |- |5 |align=left|Polska Energia Sosnowiec |- |6 |align=left|Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- |7 |align=left|NKS Nysa |- |8 |align=left|AZS Politechnika Warszawska |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|BBTS Bielsko-Biała |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Gwardia Wrocław |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2004 Polish Champions |- |Jastrzębie Borynia 1st title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Sławomir Szczygieł, Marcin Wika, Przemysław Michalczyk, Grzegorz Pilarz, Radosław Rybak, Arkadiusz Terlecki, Krzysztof Wójcik, Michał Kaczmarek, Wojciech Serafin, Piotr Gabrych, Grzegorz Nowak, Pavel Chudík |- |Head Coach |- |Igor Prieložný |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
